title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Things to Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things to Do             Things To Do         Most of the river flows at a very lazy pace, but portions can contain up to Class 2 rapids.   The Chattahoochee River is a great place for a picnic, a leisurely walk, or boating on a sunny afternoon. The 48 miles of of the river that the park contains can take up the whole day or just a few hours for a quick getaway from the fast pace of the city life.  Boating Cycling Educational Services Fishing
